name: Five Star Games
overview: A five game compendium of games previously published as stand alone titles. Combat Lynx: an action flight simulation by Nick Wilson and Julian Todd, originally released in 1985 by Durell. Death Star: a scrolling space shooter by Peter Johnson, originally released in 1985 by Superior Software. Geoff Capes Strong Man: a multi event sports game by Michael Archer and David Wainwright, originally released in 1984 by Martech. Repton: a scrolling maze game by Tim Tyler, originally released in 1985 by Superior Software. Twin Kingdom Valley: an adventure game with graphics by Trevor Hall, originally released in 1983 by Bug-Byte.
